title: Windows 10 love ??? (windows mobile)
body:
as windows phone users we're a lot smaller in number, but It would be pretty if we got some love also 

there Is also this thing that allows you to port source code easily somewhat :http://www.zdnet.com/article/porting-an-ios-app-to-windows-10-can-take-as-little-as-5-minutes/ 
but you know a man can dream

replies.body: Yeah porting would be simple, it's QA that would require some work. Anyway IMO they have more than enough potential consumers for a WP app.

Check out the IOS Bridge for Windows 10 Apps ... Took one dev 5 mins to convert over his iOS app. 
https://dev.windows.com/en-us/bridges/ios
https://github.com/Microsoft/WinObjC/releases

Why so much Windows hate?
I too would be interested in this for all Windows 10 :)
